segments.text: From where I stand, the kitchen appears busy yet ordinary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is facing away, focused on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water runs freely from the faucet into the full sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's overflowing onto the counter and floor in a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a sloppy mess; the puddle is spreading disgustingly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's oblivious, with water lapping at her shoes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, the children are raiding the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balances on that rickety stool, grabbing treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister waits patiently with an open hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole thing feels chaotic and unclean with the water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies in a kitchen flooding like this is just gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such neglect in a home.
segments.speaker: PAR
